description:
Ayanokoji makes his final decision on how to deal with Ryuen and the Class C threat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Force Without Wisdom Falls of Its Own Weight.
La force sans prudence succombe sous son propre poids.
Shiryo Naki Chikara wa Mizukara no Shitsuryou ni Yotte Kuzure Saru.
vis consilii expers mole ruit sua.
思慮なき力は自らの質量によって崩れ去る.
